mapper.select: SELECT count(*) AS cnt FROM qna WHERE qna_step = 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO qna (qna_title, qna_contents, qna_writer, qna_date, qna_ref, qna_step, qna_ref_order, qna_answer_number, qna_parent_number, qna_type, qna_status, qna_secret, member_id) VALUES (#{qnaTitle}, #{qnaContents}, #{qnaWriter}, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%y-%m-%d'), (SELECT IFNULL(MAX_qna_ref, 0) + 1 FROM (SELECT MAX(qna_ref) AS MAX_qna_ref FROM qna) AS temp), 0, 0, 0, 0, #{qnaType}, 0, #{qnaSecret}, 'b')
